title: Flat File Returns Report by Return Date

Order date.description: Date and time when the order was placed.

Return request date.description: Date and time when the return request was initiated.

Label cost.description: Cost associated with the return shipping label.

Currency code.description: The currency code used for monetary values.

Return carrier.description: Carrier used for returning the item.

Tracking ID.description: Tracking ID for the return shipment.

Label to be paid by.description: Party responsible for paying the return label costs.

A-to-Z Claim.description: Indicates if a claim has been made through Amazon A-to-Z Guarantee.

Is prime.description: Indicates if the order was fulfilled through Amazon Prime.

ASIN.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number of the product.

Merchant SKU.description: Merchant Stock Keeping Unit of the product.

Item Name.description: Name or description of the returned item.

Return Reason.description: Reason provided for returning the item.

In policy.description: Flag indicating if the return is within the return policy.

Resolution.description: Resolution status of the return request.

Invoice number.description: Unique identifier of the invoice related to the return.

Return delivery date.description: Date and time when the return was delivered.

SafeT Action reason.description: Reason for the action taken by Amazon SafeT.

SafeT claim id.description: Unique identifier of the SafeT claim.

SafeT claim creation time.description: Date and time when the SafeT claim was created.

SafeT claim reimbursement amount.description: Amount reimbursed by SafeT for the claim.

Refunded Amount.description: Total amount refunded for the return.

dataEndTime.description: End time of the data retrieval period.
